products.title: Annibale Colombo Sofa
products.description: The Annibale Colombo Sofa is a sophisticated and comfortable seating option, featuring exquisite design and premium upholstery for your living room.

products.title: Bedside Table African Cherry
products.description: The Bedside Table in African Cherry is a stylish and functional addition to your bedroom, providing convenient storage space and a touch of elegance.

products.title: Knoll Saarinen Executive Conference Chair
products.description: The Knoll Saarinen Executive Conference Chair is a modern and ergonomic chair, perfect for your office or conference room with its timeless design.

products.title: Wooden Bathroom Sink With Mirror
products.description: The Wooden Bathroom Sink with Mirror is a unique and stylish addition to your bathroom, featuring a wooden sink countertop and a matching mirror.

products.title: Skiver L Shape Sofa Set (3 Seater + Left Aligned Chaise)
products.description: The Skiver L Shape Sofa Set (3 Seater + Left Aligned Chaise) combines modern elegance with spacious comfort, featuring high-quality fabric upholstery, sturdy construction, and a versatile chaise for ultimate relaxation.

products.title: Eames Desk Unit EDU
products.description: The Eames Desk Unit (EDU) was constructed by Charles and Ray Eames in accordance with the principles of industrial production. The panels function as a modesty shield and partially enclose the two storage compartments.

products.title: Kado Office
products.description: Kado Office is a minimalist interior planning system consisting of freestanding structures. The clean lines of the frame give it an architectural look and playful three-dimensionality. Kado Office is accessible from both sides, so that in addition to providing storage space.

products.title: Alcove Plus Desk
products.subtitle: Storage Solution with Ample Space and Functionality
products.description: Alcove Plus Desk is a touchdown workstation that shields users both visually and acoustically, making it ideally suited for focussed tasks. Alcove Plus Desk comes in three sizes and can be fitted with portable partition screens, which are attached to the side panels with zip fasteners.

products.title: Grand Repos
products.description: A synchronised mechanism is concealed beneath the upholstery of the Grand Repos wing chair and can be locked in any position, for optimum back support and utmost comfort.

products.title: Coffee Table
products.description: In creating his design for the Coffee Table, Isamu Noguchi translated the biomorphic aesthetic of his sculptural works into a piece of furniture with distinctive organic forms.

products.title: Alcove Plus Desk
products.description: Alcove Plus Desk is a touchdown workstation that shields users both visually and acoustically, making it ideally suited for focussed tasks.

products.title: Eames Tandem Seating ETS
products.description: Designed by Charles and Ray Eames for use in waiting areas, the robust Tandem Seating system has proven its quality over a period of decades, providing a comfortable place to sit in airports, train stations and other public spaces.

products.title: Dining Table
products.description: The Dining Table by Isamu Noguchi is one of the most elegant dining tables in the history of twentieth-century furniture design.

products.title: Cushions
products.description: Cushions come in a collection of various sizes. They can be used either as back cushions or for purely decorative purposes and provide soft pleasant comfort.

products.title: Abalon Sofa
products.subtitle: Sample Subtitle 15
products.description: The iconic Abalon Sofa, named after the shell of a sea snail, has an organically curved shape that evokes a circle to which people feel drawn. The comfortably padded seat shell offers a place for quiet seclusion.

products.title: Resting Bear
products.description: Resting Animals whose poses exude a serene tranquillity. The largest is a knit-covered bear that can be used for a variety of functions, such as a stool, ottoman or backrest.
